Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is: Wicked Wolf Tavern


From Dev: Some people break for animals. I break for new restaurants : )

Wicked Wolf Tavern is the newest restaurant from the people who brought us Black Bear Saloon, located where Playwright restaurant was. I have fond memories of Playwright, so I'm looking forward to checking this place out and seeing what's the same and what's different. I've heard that they're keeping true to the beautiful architecture, and that they kept many of the great bartenders and waitstaff from Playwright.


At 7pm they will start having live music : ) the flyer can be seen here: http://www.postroadne...
